processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value and add divisors to sum

advice.text: Turn the remaining high-level comment about the loop into code next; you already have input and sum set up.
Decide loop bounds (start at 1, end at n) and the check for a divisor (use the remainder being zero) before adding to sum.

Write a for-loop that visits each i from 1 to n; inside, if n modulo i equals zero, add i to sum; after the loop, print sum. Start by writing the loop header and an empty body, then fill the condition and update.
